mapper.insert: insert into COUPON_GROUP (promotion_id, discount_amount, quantity) values (#{promotionId}, #{discountAmount}, #{quantity})
insert into COUPONS (coupon_number, coupon_group_id, member_id, issued_date, expire_date, is_used) values (#{couponNumber}, #{couponGroupId}, #{memberId}, #{issuedDate}, #{expireDate}, #{isUsed})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM COUPONS WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId} AND expire_date > NOW() AND is_used = 0 ) AS is_valid_coupon
